Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{3: 'You finally make it to the final stage of the mission, but you are met with an arduous battle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Storm', 3: "That's quite a crowd! Nanamideon, activate!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Storm swings her chainsaw menacingly at the hostiles, even just scratching an enemy causes it to explode into scrap metal.'}
{2: 'Storm is OP! How many Storms did I pull?!', 3: '10'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Half of the enemies have been annihilated, while Storm only sustained minor injuries.'}
{3: 'Regardless, the outcome of the battle still looks bleak. The reason being...'}
{2: "What's up with my team being all close-ranged...", 3: '13'}
{3: 'Dawn, Tenebrion, Astral, and Arclight... The only long-ranged member is Blast, but sending her out will cause other issues.'}
{3: 'Your team members are unable to get close to the last elite enemy standing firmly atop a cliff...'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '(Laughs sardonically) Are you out of options?'}
{2: 'Elite Enemy', 3: 'Rargh!! Rargh!!!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'If we can just make it fall down...', 3: '21'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Do you need it to fall?'}
{3: 'Suddenly, the battlefield begins to shake.'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'Importing global variable dataâ€”complete.'}
{3: 'The hill that the elite enemy was standing on abruptly disappears, causing it to fall to the ground.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'In "Virtual Horizon", battlefield conditions will intermittently change and produce different effects to simulate a variety of battle scenarios. Looks like you got lucky.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Storm', 3: 'From the hate-scorched sky, with righteous anger in our hearts! Corrupted Bane!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Storm shreds the elite enemy to pieces just as it hits the ground.'}
{2: 'Amazing! Storm is unstoppable!', 3: '33'}
{3: 'But was that change to the battlefield really... just a coincidence?'}
{2: '-AI-', 3: 'The elite enemy has been vanquished. Combat complete. Congratulations!'}
{2: 'Did you help me?', 3: '36'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "There's no way. This AI is just an AI. And it's from ages past, it won't help you out on its own.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But something doesn't seem quite right...", 3: '40'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Alright, this week's test is over. Good work. I hope you keep it up next week as well.", 4: '1'}
